query.prompt:
For each row in the table, look up the etymology of the word. In the "Derived" column, write French, Latin, Greek, Germanic, etc. In the "Etymology" column, fill in the corresponding word in Greek, Latin, or others, but leave blank if unknown.
| English | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | in | | | | the | | | | middle | | | | of | | | | the | | | | journey | | | | of | | | | our | | | | life | | | | I | | | | find | | | | myself | | | | within | | | | a | | | | dark | | | | wood | | | | for | | | | the | | | | straight | | | | way | | | | be | | | | lose | | |
